page.title: 19DAY IN A PUPILS LIFE
page.content: I awake at 7.00 am on a Thursday and lie in untill 8.30. Exercise books, pencil cases and felt tip pens go into a grey, shoulder bag to be carried to school. I have not got far to walk,and leaving home at 8.57, I arrive at school for 9.00am.The bell rings as I go through the gates,so,I go to my tutor to be registered.At 9.30 I go for an hour of LIFE SKILLS.Then there is 15 mins break and after an hour of PE.I have to leave 35 mins early for a dentist appointment.Thanks to COLGATE (toothpaste) I do not have to have any decay drilled out of my tooth or a filling put in.The bell goes at 1.20 to mark the end of lunch break.Then an hours French,a 10 min break,an hour English till 3.55 then I go home.After a tea of fishcake,chips and peas I call on a friend and watch television Between 9.00 and 10.30 I go to bed.
